snippet.title: Simmiland - Official launch trailer
snippet.description:
Simmiland v1.4 - releasing on Steam and Itch.io November 30th 2018

Simmiland is a game where you play as god. You create a civilization by indirectly influencing the surroundings using cards. Such as trees and plants. Once you're out of cards you play the final apocalypse card and end it! Buy more cards through getting achievements and find multiple ways for mankind to develop.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/932850/Simmiland/
